title: The Screaming Fox: Episode 303
description:
Lyonshall is one of those picture perfect places, a caring rural community at its heart, and surrounded by glorious hilly countryside. Set in the north-west corner of Herefordshire, it lies close to the Welsh border.

On a hot summers night, a couple went to bed. As they did so, they could not begin to imagine that there was an intruder lurking in the shadows, and the horror he planned to inflict after he broke into their home.....

Writing credit: Chris Wood. Â https://www.pen-and-sword.co.uk/Chris-Wood/a/4093
